title: revolving doors shall not be located at the foot of a stairway
clause_text: revolving doors shall not be located at the foot of a stairway. Any stairway served by a revolving door shall discharge through a lobby or foyer. Stairways shall be constructed of non-combustible materials throughout.

source_pdf.text_snippet: revolving doors shall not be located at the foot of a stairway. Any stairway served by a revolving door shall discharge through a lobby or foyer.
